name: DEF1
description: $DEF1 is the first token launched on XPAD, a decentralized Ethereum launchpad powered by bonding curves. Originally created as a test token to validate XPADâ€™s mechanism, DEF1 gained unexpected community traction. It has no pre-sale, no team allocation, and operates with zero mint functions. All tokens are distributed via bonding, ensuring fair access. XPAD redistributes generated fees to its ecosystem, supporting $XERS (staking rewards) and $KOKO (burns). The project promotes transparency, decentralization, and utility-based sustainability within DeFi.
